entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
